mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.couse_id AS "couseId", a.judgment_title AS "judgmentTitle", a.judgment_answer AS "judgmentAnswer", a.degree AS "degree", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.is_delete AS "isDelete"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO judgment( id, couse_id, judgment_title, judgment_answer, degree, create_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{couseId}, #{judgmentTitle}, #{judgmentAnswer}, #{degree}, #{createTime}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE judgment SET couse_id = #{couseId}, judgment_title = #{judgmentTitle}, judgment_answer = #{judgmentAnswer}, degree = #{degree}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
